user.title: Casambi
user.description: Request an API key from Casambi: https://developer.casambi.com/

site_user.title: Casambi
site_user.description: Create a site (https://support.casambi.com/support/solutions/articles/12000041325-how-to-create-a-site) and fill in the credentials for the site account here. Note that the email is case-sensitive.

network.title: Casambi
network.description: Make sure you enabled a gateway for your network (https://support.casambi.com/support/solutions/articles/12000017046-how-to-enable-a-gateway-for-a-network-) and fill in the network password.
